title: Runtime Error When in Champ Select or Logging In
body:
I keep getting the following error when I'm either logging in or in champ select. I can dismiss it, but my game will usually crash soon affterwards if I try to play, and then I need to restart :c It happens maybe a couple times a week, and it only happens when I'm playing league. 

This is the error:
Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime Library
Runtime Error!
Program C:\Pro...
R6025
- Pure virtual function call

replies.body: The C++ Runtime is a product for windows, and can cause your client to not respond properly if it malfunctions.  As a first step, download and reinstall [Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable Package ](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)to get this fixed up.  Test it out in a custom game to prevent any penalties!  Let me know if your issue persists, and I'd be happy to help!
